entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 08:03 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.4°C

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
